solution_line_template: 65% of the library books are for adults because {percent_total} - {percent_children} = <<{percent_total}-{percent_children}={percent_adult}>>{percent_adult}
There are {total_books} library books in total because {num_adult_books} / {percent_adult_decimal} = <<{num_adult_books}/{percent_adult_decimal}={total_books}>>{total_books}
